website_summaries.verdict: Sleek 60-minute hourglass for a low price.
pros: Cheaper option for a full 60-minute hourglass
The wooden frame is sturdy and there are four sand colors available
cons: Glass piece may be slightly loose in frame

customer_reviews.title: It's a solid buy
customer_reviews.text: It tires out my eyes out to look at a screen all day. So...if I want to write or relax without having to constantly check my phone, I just flip this and enjoy my hour. It's strangely relaxing, too. It's something about watching the sands of time tumbling through the hour glass that makes me feel a little more zen-like and a little more at peace. It's been an unexpected benefit for my creative pursuits.
customer_reviews.author: D. Jack

customer_reviews.title: Need to measure hours? This is your tool!
customer_reviews.text: I write/think throughout my day. Granted neither of these things I do well, but I like to take a step back once in a while to contemplate (and yes, I do so while holding a pipe) and use this to know when I've been writing/working too long to focus. This is just like any hourglass you can buy anywhere else. It is right at an hour in measurement, but as I cannot imagine how the quality control works it is not guaranteed that all will work as well as mine.
customer_reviews.author: Charles G.

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for, and pretty fashionable
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about finding a good sand hourglass, but this one was just what i was looking for. It’s pretty sturdy and it’s exactly one hour.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: however it is still very nice and family and friends love it
customer_reviews.text: Was a tad bit smaller than expected, however it is still very nice and family and friends love it. Does not break easily, do not be fooled by negative reviews. Comes in great packaging, very nice item for gift or for your home. May purchase another for friend
customer_reviews.author: Rasheed

customer_reviews.title: It's decent enough
customer_reviews.text: The hourglass arrived two days after i ordered it and Amazon kept up with all of the tracking info, which was nice. The packaging was just as described (Styrofoam encasing the hourglass inside of a box). It arrived intact, nothing broken, no chips, and no damage. It was made of hard plastic instead of wood but it seems sturdy enough. Its not exactly timed at 60minutes but its close enough. The price was pretty cheap compared to most REAL TIMED hourglasses but next time ill look a little harder but if i cant find anything as cheap as this, this will be my las resort.
customer_reviews.author: Starla Valage

customer_reviews.title: 60 minute timer is on target
customer_reviews.text: Timed at 63 minutes, this is a good product with an acceptable error margin. Seller did a great job in following through with good service to correct a product/shipping error. Made it right, can't ask for more!
customer_reviews.author: S. Holloway

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as shown. This product is made of glass and wood but the packaging was fairly substantial and arrived quickly without any problems. I am using it as a visual representation of a hydraulic issue in a watershed in Southern California.
customer_reviews.author: C. Busslinger

customer_reviews.title: It makes a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to a long time friend for his 60th birthday. It made a great presentation and was received very well . After the party was winding down the guest of honor put it on the table with coffee and cake. He opened it and started it. I timed it with a stop watch on my wrist watch. It's exactly 60 mins. it made an excellent gift, looks nice and is a 60 min timer.
customer_reviews.author: James M.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hourglass
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful hourglass that makes it a perfect decoration item pretty much anywhere you put it. This 60 minutes hourglass is big and makes a presence. The one I got is only good for 57 minutes, so 3 minutes short of 60 and the sand does tend to stick to the glass a little, adding a bit more of unreliability to it but overall still a very nice hourglass.
customer_reviews.author: avi8tor4life

customer_reviews.title: I love this gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this early as a Father's Day gift and When I received this Hourglass gift box I was pleasantly surprised. It came with a beautifully decorated wrapping paper. The customer service was wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: nell

customer_reviews.title: For the price, the quality is about as expected.
customer_reviews.text: The look is good but the quality is about average. The accuracy is not good which is expected for the price. I don't like the fact that it's not consistent due to the problem of more and more sand sticking to the sides the more you turn it over. I use it when I take pain medication. It is about the amount of time it takes for the medication to work. The sand represents pain. When the sand is gone, so is the pain. For me it's better than looking at the clock.
customer_reviews.author: JEFFERY A LENGL

customer_reviews.title: Elegant, at a distance.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mom as a gift. She had been bugging me for a large hourglass, and this was the one I settled on. It was almost accurate, about 3 seconds off, but that’s not terrible. Thankfully she wanted it as decoration more than for its accuracy. It’s a hair on the cheap side but for a curio cabinet, it’s just fine. From a distance it’s beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: R. W. Eggert

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a sort of first clock for my 2 year old. She sometimes naps and sometimes doesn’t, but we say she needs to take an hour of quiet time in her room regardless every day. This 1 hour sand timer allows her to visualize time passing and know when that hour is up. For our purposes it has been a huge success. It seems a bit puny, but has help up in a toddler’s bedroom so it can’t be too fragile.
customer_reviews.author: C. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Sand doesn't drain entirely
customer_reviews.text: Received the item promptly. The glass was a bit scuffed even though it was packed up tightly. My biggest issue is that the sand doesn't perfectly drain. There is a sand residue ring so you have to flick the glass to get the last ring of sand to drain to the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: barnard gumble

customer_reviews.title: I'm very pleased with this hourglass.
customer_reviews.text: The hourglass seems to be well made. It's also pretty. The sand takes about 62 minutes to pass through. I'm very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: G. L. Kessler

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Came to my home in good condition, no defects, it last 60 mins as said, I will say it's not a high end hour glass made with cheaper materials but functions properly so for the price I give it 5 stars if you looking for a high end hourglass you might want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but is completely inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for a friend as part of a themed Christmas present. Coming out of the box it looks very nice and seems sturdy and my friend was excited about the gift upon opening. However, that was short lived. It initially didn't work at all and took a bit to get the sand to even filter down. After multiple tries over multiple days, he gave up on the accuracy - it wasn't just a minute or two off per other reviews but more like 35-40 minutes off. I was very disappointed and also a bit embarrassed as it was a gift. I will be returning it unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat disappointed
customer_reviews.text: The sand dropping down is too thin, you can hardly see it. That is what makes it eye catching, the sand dropping and you hardly see because it’s so thin
customer_reviews.author: Omer Viveros

customer_reviews.title: The worst thing I have shopped on Amazon so far
customer_reviews.text: First time, it arrived literally broken, I had sand all over my sofa when I first cheerfully opened it up. Second time, the hourglass is okay, but the wood is broken!! Don't have the time and energy to return it the second time! Wouldn't recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Fatima Q.

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Calming corner: I purchased this hourglass to put in the Peace Corner of my new elementary classroom, which is an area where the 4th-6th grade students can go to calm down when they get overwhelmed. When I saw the hourglass, I knew it was just what I needed. I don't need for it to be a timer, but I DO need it to be high-quality and substantial, which it is. I can't wait to add it to the materials that will help my students slow down when things get too hectic.
customer_reviews.author: BeckeyT

customer_reviews.title: Nice hourglass, but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: This is an elegant do-dad to have on-hand as a decor item in kitchen, bedroom or family room, but it is smaller than anticipated. I am happy with the item, it is classy-looking.
customer_reviews.author: A Marie Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great piece.
customer_reviews.text: Husband wanted a conversation piece and said he always wanted an hourglass. He is very happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Janise Rowell

customer_reviews.title: Poorly affixed to frame and there is a human hair visible in the globes
customer_reviews.text: I got this for decoration and while it certainly won't win any awards it's passable. It's unevenly attached to the wooden frame and when watching the sand to make sure it flowed correctly I noticed a full 2" hair inside the globe. How does that even happen?
customer_reviews.author: William D Bowling

customer_reviews.title: good item
customer_reviews.text: did not rate accuracy as I didn't check it...was a gift ... have heard no complaints from them
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Isn’t exactly 1 HR
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful timer and classic design. I would give 5/5 except for mine wasn’t exactly 1 hr. I timed it and the timing of the sand for mine is about 1 hr and 2 minutes. It could possibly have been influenced by environmental conditions. Regardless, would definitely recommend as a gift or office decoration!
customer_reviews.author: Jw4n9

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Needed it as a prop for a presentation but it is also a fine time instrument. 60 minutes, not precise but they never are
customer_reviews.author: D. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: Neat.
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why I bought this, I have an Amazon problem, works as described though.
customer_reviews.author: Chris T.

customer_reviews.title: Item as described
customer_reviews.text: As described I think I could’ve found it cheaper if I took the time to look around
customer_reviews.author: Exclusively polished

customer_reviews.title: Accurate and cute
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and is accurate to within a minute! Perfect for my use
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Also could be a nice gift.
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product it's beautiful. It came very nicely packaged and although I bought it for myself it came with wrapping paper so that it could be inspected prior to sending as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Joel P. McKinzie

customer_reviews.title: Nice and accurate
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice little hourglass. Quite accurate, as it is right around 59 minutes. They are never actually exact.
customer_reviews.author: Roz Franz

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Such a great product! I use it to increase productivity at work! Great quality, mine is spot on an hour!!
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: but is way cool!
customer_reviews.text: Mine runs about a minute short. This is not designed for 100% accuracy, but is way cool!
customer_reviews.author: DHartman

customer_reviews.title: It's an hourglass - I like it!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hourglass - I use it to time periods of work. It's pretty sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Steven M Long

customer_reviews.title: A great and unusual 90th birthday present.
customer_reviews.text: The perfect gift to the man who has everything and is celebrating his 90th birthday. It sits on the corner of the bar in the family room and everyone who walks by turns it over. This hourglass is a wonderful conversation piece.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Crews

customer_reviews.title: Just a little small
customer_reviews.text: Came a little...shorter than I thought...but still a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Malik

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It looks smaller then expected. The glass is a little offset/crooked inside the wood. But for $20 I guess I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.author: lyndsey reese

customer_reviews.title: Time Blocking
customer_reviews.text: Dale Carnegie who wrote the second best selling book behind the Bible touches on this.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Castro

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Hour Glass
customer_reviews.text: I've always been intrigued by hour glasses and this is really cool hour glass. It gets a lot of attention where we set it (it is always getting flipped) and it continues to work perfectly. Pretty darn accurate too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: time was a little off
customer_reviews.text: Its looks exactly as in the picture, but the timer is 4 minutes off which was kind of disappointing. If you can find a better one it might be worth the extra money.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac

customer_reviews.title: Don’t know
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought it would be. Otherwise very nice.
customer_reviews.author: eileen cowles

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful hourglass
customer_reviews.text: Really nice item, wrapped very well and shipped in a timely fashion. I love my new hour glass! thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony Miller

customer_reviews.title: It's nice, but the ad says it's wood
customer_reviews.text: It's nice, but the ad says it's wood. The top and bottom are wood. The 'dowels' are plastic. But for the price, it's a good buy. We're pleased.
customer_reviews.author: william j.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. The color chosen was fabulous. Right size for where it was placed
customer_reviews.author: Nazima Ali

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time in flimsy box...shattered. I needed it ASAP for my son’s school project and now I’m screwed. Thanks!!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Really happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted an hour glass that I could just put on my desk and it would go for awhile. Not only does this one go for a long time, it is also very accurate. Each time I test it, it finishes within 1 sec on 60 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It bigger than the picture
customer_reviews.text: I thought the product would be a good conversation piece with my clients
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great hour glass
customer_reviews.text: Timed it at 1 hr and 12 sec. Perfect for my one hour cycle study and the size is perfect for my desk and view of the looks and time. I’d recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Maia D. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool
customer_reviews.text: This looks cool sitting on a shelf with other junk. I timed it, it came up 59:30. Pretty darn close (not that I'll be using it to track time). It's a good size too. Well made. I'm happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: SouthpawShredder

customer_reviews.title: Got this as a gift for my boyfriend...
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty cool little hourglass. We haven't checked yet to see if it's accurately an hour yet, but it got here relatively fast and I could even change the sand color which I LOVED that I could do because my boyfriend's favorite color is purple, so it was really perfect!! So far, the frame seems sturdy, although I was under the impression that it was wooden, I believe it might be plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Parker

customer_reviews.title: It does not work.  **UPDATED**  Got a good replacement
customer_reviews.text: I received it on time, it was as ordered and it looked like the advertisement but, it doesn't work. The sand jams up and it won't clear. It would be nice if they would test these things before they send them out. The seller reached out to me and sent me a replacement that works. It now does what I purchased it for.
customer_reviews.author: G. K. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Sand doesn’t move
customer_reviews.text: Amazon was nice enough to send me a new replacement same day, even though I got my money back. The first one, the sand didn’t move at all. This one, we tested it and it stopped at 45 minutes. Had to shake it to move. They should just remove this off the market. 2 out of 2 is not a good record.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee table or display item
customer_reviews.text: This really does count down 60 minutes, but it's an excellent decorative item and conversation piece as well. We bought this after admiring a friend's hourglass for a while. It's a little smaller than I expected, but still pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: B. J. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Decent.  It's off about 3-4 minutes.  (If you are a procastinator like me, get this)
customer_reviews.text: Decent if you don't really care about accuracy like me. I use it as a task timer when I work so I can work more efficiently from one task to another. Very effective for procrastinator.
customer_reviews.author: West

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product....like sands through the hourglass, so are the days of our lives.
customer_reviews.author: Football Coach

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice! Tad smaller than I thought it would be but still like it. Well packaged. Was a gift for a collector and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: For the price you can't beat it.
customer_reviews.text: For the price looks great. Mine took around 63 minutes when flipped so that is completely acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Gabor Ambruzs

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Always be sure to look at the dimensions before purchasing. I thought that it was going to be a bit larger; but I still like it, it fits well in a different area of my home.
customer_reviews.author: Tradewinds

customer_reviews.title: Nice Hour Glass
customer_reviews.text: I purchased as a visual aid at work to get up and walk away from my desk while working. I set a timer to see if it was actually an hour and it was right on. It’s not to big and doesn’t take much space on my desk.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M Strom

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: It’s an hour glass... I ordered cause I wanted it now I have it and I’m pleased
customer_reviews.author: Kindle owner

customer_reviews.title: great unexpected gift
customer_reviews.text: I guess I would call this a serio-gag gift. I have a friend who said he "needed more time" and I thought this would be a nice way to show him how slow or how fast time passes. He was charmed!
customer_reviews.author: kcjazzyone

customer_reviews.title: Fine quality!
customer_reviews.text: The hourglass is simple, but elegant. Well-crafted, very sturdy, and easy to store. I use it for meditation.
customer_reviews.author: JoeMavro

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Great quality and added alittle something different to my bathroom
customer_reviews.author: kerrie silver

customer_reviews.title: Not as expected
customer_reviews.text: It is indeed a beautiful hourglass. However, it arrived damage. The hourglass itself was no longer stuck to the frame and the sand stuck to the sides of the glass. The blue color is stunning though.
customer_reviews.author: AbiT

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Beautifully made, looks amazing on my desk and is perfect for keeping track of therapy sessions. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful! Got my hourglass quickly and it's a lovely addition to my bookshelf. Nice packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: The one I got is not straight,  but figure most are. Just my luck.
customer_reviews.text: The glass is not standing straight up on one end.
customer_reviews.author: greg nowlin

customer_reviews.title: Loved! Got it as a gift for someone’s office ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved! Got it as a gift for someone’s office It is a little less Thanks 60 minuets it was around 57 or 58 which isn’t bad
customer_reviews.author: josey

customer_reviews.title: Hourglass
customer_reviews.text: It’s pretty. Note the measurements because it’s much smaller than what pic portrays. To be fair, they do give measurements.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Harbour

customer_reviews.title: Good room accessory
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and fairly solid. A bit smaller than I expected, but good nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Very classy, modern looking hourglass. I got it for my son's classroom. He is super happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Holly H. Clem

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and functional
customer_reviews.text: Pretty and functional. I use it for those jobs I really don't want to do. I can tackle an hour of it and move on knowing I at least made some progress.
customer_reviews.author: Hazel Bedazel

product_meta.title: Daya Fashion Tanmalan Hourglass Sand timers (White Sand,Black Frame,60min)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars286 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
